Title: Implement Hashicorp Vault for Kubernetes Clusters

Description:
As a developer, I want the security team to get Hashicorp Vault up and running for our Kubernetes clusters, so that we can securely manage and store our secrets.

Acceptance Criteria:

* Hashicorp Vault is successfully installed and configured on Kubernetes clusters.
* Policies for different roles and applications accessing secrets are created and configured.
* Hashicorp Vault is integrated with Kubernetes and tested for secure secret retrieval.
* Clear and concise documentation is provided for installation, configuration, and integration steps.
* Monitoring and alerting is set up to detect and address issues with the Hashicorp Vault setup.
* Training and support is provided to the development team on secure secret management.

The implementation of Hashicorp Vault will enable us to centrally manage secrets, such as API keys, passwords, and certificates, and avoid hard-coding sensitive data in our application code or configuration files. Once all acceptance criteria have been met, the Hashicorp Vault implementation will be considered complete and the development team can start using it for securely managing secrets in their applications.
